Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran's 53-ball 98 knock laid the foundation for West Indies' 104-run victory against Afghanistan
Obed McCoy's three for 14, including three wickets in eight balls, and Akeal Hosein's wicket maiden in the first over derailed the Afghan chase
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the final Group-C match of the T20 World Cup 2024
Others: The match was played at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, Saint Lucia
